body.p:
State of Ky Clinton County
Nov 1865

I Wallace Davis a citizen of Clinton County do Certify upon honour that on the day that William H Harrisons Store was broken up in Albany Ky and at the Same time for which John F Sloan & others were Indicted at the last Term of the Clinton Circuit Court that I met the Said John F Sloan in the Road after the destruction of the Store that he the Said Sloan had none of the goods taken from Harrison in his possession neither do I think from the knowledge I have of the affair that Said Sloan had anything to do with the Store in any manner
We H H Hurt & W H Summers do certify that we saw John F Sloan on the day and time spoken in within certificate and that we saw him ^with^ none of the goods alleged to have been taken

H. H. Hurt
W H Summers
